message: Only one statement per line allowed.
First sentence of Javadoc is incomplete (period is missing) or not present.
'}' at column 9 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
First sentence of Javadoc is incomplete (period is missing) or not present.

Distance between variable 'originalStatus' declaration and its first usage is 7, but allowed 3.  Consider making that variable final if you still need to store its value in advance (before method calls that might have side effects on the original value).
